channel.title: [PI] D claws have infinite special?
channel.description: Well my d claws have infinite special, even if you have 0% spec bar if you click the spec bar it'll spec. Can anyone help?

item.title: [PI] D claws have infinite special?
item.dc:creator: @Noob.Coder Noob.Coder
item.description:
@Noob.Coder wrote:

[quote=“Ashton51, post:12, topic:372189”][quote author=Noob.Coder link=topic=468250.msg3423420#msg3423420 date=1291697448]

That’s what I have right now, can you tell me where to add it because when I put what you say I get 100 errors in the compiler.

ONCE AGAIN

public boolean checkSpecAmount

You are putting in the wrong spot obviously.

Alright I’m sorry I didn’t see that no need to get angry online.
[/quote]

Lol, I’m not getting angry at all, just pointing out that i post responses trying to help for a reason and its an insult if you don’t even read them before asking for help again.[/quote]

Sorry I just kind of saw the stuff I already had and just didn’t read the rest. Thank you it works just fine now

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] D claws have infinite special?
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“Noob.Coder, post:5, topic:372189”]case 1215:// dragon dagger case 1231: case 5680: case 5698: case 1305: // dragon long case 11694: case 11698: case 11700: case 11730: case 11696: case 13899: case 14484: c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7574); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7586); break;

It’s already in there…[/quote]
If you are trying to change how much spec dragon claws use then in you CombatAssistant class

public boolean checkSpecAmount

NOTE: 100 specAmount is 1000% special bar,
in PI, Specials are in increments of 10, so 10 specAmount is one full special bar
so you would want to make it check that the player has more than 5 specAmount and then to decrease their specAmount by 5.

e.g

case 14484: if(c.specAmount >= 5) { c.specAmount -= 5; c.getItems().addSpecialBar(weapon); return true; }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] D claws have infinite special?
item.dc:creator: @Noob.Coder Noob.Coder
item.description:
@Noob.Coder wrote:

		[CODE]case 1215:// dragon dagger
		case 1231:
		case 5680:
		case 5698:
		case 1305: // dragon long
		case 11694:
		case 11698:
		case 11700:
		case 11730:
		case 11696:
		case 13899:
		case 14484:
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7574); 
		specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7586);
		break;[/CODE]

It’s already in there…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] D claws have infinite special?
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“Noob.Coder, post:3, topic:372189”][quote author=Pest link=topic=468250.msg3423327#msg3423327 date=1291690826]
Search for this case 1215:// dragon dagger case 1231: case 5680: In Items.Java, somewhere in there add this: Case 14484:
so it’s this case 1215:// dragon dagger case 1231: case 5680: case 14484: Hope i helped again ;D
[/quote]

Won’t that make it only hit twice or only take up 25% spec?

Also items.java isn’t PI.[/quote]

There is an Item.java in PI

But he is talking about the addSpecialBar method which is in your ItemAssistant class, not your Item class.

Read full topic
